title: Looking for Bronze/Silver players to help me on the expedition to not suck!
body: Need some fun, salt free players to duo with. I main mid and try to play almost everyday.

replies.body:
Add me if you want :)

JWhizz

add me mid/top main
who cares about rank lol

You can add me if you need a sup
PRlME TlME
Just play yi. Best champion in the game.
If only I could play ap yi again :L
There is a quote I read online once for this game "You either die a noob or live long enough too see yourself become salty."
You can add me, silver support main currently.
